[[inst_hl_bstart_call]]
==== HL.BSTART CALL

*Syntax:* HL.BSTART.CALL, <br_label>, <rt_label>, -> ra

*Description:* Block Start with CALL: marks entry point for a function/block that may be called.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_bstart_call.svg[HL.BSTART CALL encoding,width=800]

*Group:* BBD/BSTART
